effect_entries.effect: Held: If the holder is hit by a damaging Water move, it consumes this item and raises its Special Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: If the holder is hit by a damaging Water move, raises its Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.
